description.lang: The CLIQ.mini is designed to be a powerful, low-cost smart home control hub that supports hundreds of the most popular products from todays top manufacturers. CLIQ.mini supports: lighting, security integration, door locks, garage doors, thermostats, video surveillance, multi-room audio, video entertainment, sensors, other devices and more!Always Current, Always RunningShipped preloaded with the Clare automation system, the CLIQ.mini control hub is the in-home brain of the automation solution. The CLIQ.mini hub receives automatic silent updates to ensure the product is always up to date with the latest features and fixes without requiring integrators to roll trucks, and without interrupting end users running applications.Maintenance EaseThe control hub is the gateway to Clares Automation Cloud Ecosystem, allowing integrators to configure, deploy and maintain the system remotely.
